items.comment: Enjoy Liberty Mountain. Hope to see you again soon

items.badge_description: Carrol Valley bar flies and beer lovers unite!!! Liberty Mountain Resort is home to some of the valley's best beer and customers. Come on out, check in, and see how many levels (and specials) you can unlock with our new local badge.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 85 check-ins with a photo.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 295 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 60!

items.checkin_comment: Definently has a sour kick, more honeysuckle flavors come through than I was expecting.

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three Thursdays in a 30 day period!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 160 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 33!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 55 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 12!
More elusive than the rarest of beers, this badge won't be back again for another 4 years. Congratulate yourself for unlocking it. Now, let's just focus on this whole extra day to enjoy some brews!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 51)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 52!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 200 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 41!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 155 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 32!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 120 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 25!
Dating back to the 18th century, porters remain an extremely popular style to this day. That is 15 different beers with the style of Porter. Try 5 more Level 4!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 290 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 59!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 80 check-ins with a photo.
Cheers to Mardi Gras and happy Fat Tuesday to all! Bright colors, beads, and great beers - what a perfect combo!

items.checkin_comment: Sweeter taste after sitting in the can

items.badge_description: When traveling, Crowlers are the best way to enjoy fresh draft beer without worrying about cracking the glass! That's 5 beers with the serving style of Crowler. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 40 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 9

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 25 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 6!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 195 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 40!
Once you’ve had just one, there’s no doubt you’ll be saying "I'll be bock" for another. That's 5 different Bock beers. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 80 distinct venues!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 285 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 58!
It's been a year since your last birthday on Untappd? Whoa - time flies! Happy birthday to you from all of us at Untappd!

items.comment: Jerry J. We had 6 from Stratus and a good amount of others

items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 50!

We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 50 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 11!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 25 different beers with the style of IPA - New England (Imperial or Single), Pale Ale - New England or IPA - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 6!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 75 check-ins with a photo.

Wouldn’t it be nice if milk stouts came directly from beer producing cows? While this unfortunately isn’t the case (yet) they do have a full body and sweetness due to a larger amount of lactose and sugars. That's 5 different beers with the style of Milk / Sweet Stout. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 5)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 25 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 6!

You don't always intend to go for beers with a double digit ABV, but when you do, you make it count! Cheers to you, but be careful, 10% and up can really pack a punch. That's 15 different beers with an ABV of 10% and up. Try 5 more for Level 4!

items.checkin_comment: Cherries and bourbon soaked oak chips

items.badge_description: Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 15 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 4!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 35 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 8
